name: spreadsheetSetRowHeight
description: Sets the height of a row in a worksheet.

params.name: spreadsheetObj
params.description: The Excel spreadsheet object to which to set the column width.

params.name: rowNumber
params.description: Specifies the row to set the height.

examples.title: Simple spreadsheetSetRowHeight Example
examples.description: Here,we've example to set the height for particular row in excel. It is supported only in adobe coldfusion.
